Rakt Brahmand: The Bloody Kingdom is an Indian-Hindi language action fantasy television series on Netflix directed by Rahi Anil Barve, who co-wrote the series with Sita R. Menon. Produced under the banner D2R Films by Raj & DK in collaboration with Netflix, the series stars Aditya Roy Kapur, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Ali Fazal, Wamiqa Gabbi and Jaideep Ahlawat.
Based on a Marathi short story Vidushak by G. A. Kulkarni, this series is set to premiere in Netflix as a six-episode limited series.
Premise
Season 1
This series is set in a fictional kingdom where it focuses on the conflict between two princes who are vying for the throne of the kingdom.
Cast
* Aditya Roy Kapur as Rahul / Prince Vithal
* Samantha Ruth Prabhu
* Ali Fazal
* Wamiqa Gabbi
* Jaideep Ahlawat as Bhulwa / Prince Vithal
* Zakir Hussain
* Vipin Sharma
* Nikitin Dheer
